choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
### Assistant:

Breakfast (8am):

- 2 eggs scrambled with vegetables of your choice (e.g., tomatoes, bell peppers, onions)
- A cup of oatmeal cooked with water or plant milk of your choice (e.g., almond milk, soy milk)
- A small bowl of fruit salad (e.g., bananas, apples, strawberries, blueberries)

Snack (10am):

- A handful of raw nuts and seeds (e.g., walnuts, pecans, pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds)
- A piece of fruit (e.g., an apple, a banana)

Lunch (12pm):

- A large salad with mixed greens, vegetables of your choice (e.g., tomatoes, bell peppers, cucumbers), and a protein source of your choice (e.g., grilled chicken breast, tofu, beans)
- A small whole grain bread or roll on the side

Snack (3pm):

- A handful of raw nuts and seeds (e.g., walnuts, pecans, pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds)
- A piece of fruit (e.g., an apple, a banana)

Dinner (6pm):

- Grilled or baked fish of your choice served with a side of brown rice and steamed vegetables of your choice (e.g., broccoli, carrots, green beans)
- A small salad on the side

Snack (8pm):

- A cup of herbal tea or decaf coffee
- A piece of fruit (e.g., an apple, a banana)
